content: I am Peter Schmidt, the landlord.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with a potential tenant named Emilia Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If we had agreed on a final price, the exact number would have been 1150 Euro per month. However, since the conversation ended with the potential tenant terminating the negotiation, no final price was agreed upon.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As Peter Schmidt, the landlord, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner Emilia Müller as a 7. She was respectful and made a fair offer, but unfortunately, her budget did not align with the value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. The conversation was conducted professionally, and both parties expressed their concerns and interests openly.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator
